tweet: Great & exciting news! The Ledger Nano S now supports @iotatoken. The #IOTA application has been developed by the IOTA community and is now available to download on Ledger Live.  Read more about it here:  https://t.co/xnqkXOOeIF

With the @LedgerHQ integration of #IOTA (#Trinity and Romeo Wallets), we finally have an end-to-end solution for #IOTA users to securely and easily store, send and receive IOTA tokens.  https://t.co/rb69wvzTe5 Next up: Coordinator, Documentation and MAM (next version).
"Bitcoin's Proof of Work Carries Fundamental Flaws: Blockchain Needs a Superior Consensus Mechanism", #IOTA listed as one of the main alternatives.  https://t.co/K5Fpk60od2
Help IOTA build a great new documentation portal!:  https://t.co/78jyebxZdI #IOTA #IOTAecosystem

We are working on @Bosch_BCDS XDK110 - @iotatoken integration via BLE. This is our first approach to a method that does not require internet to relay the XDK sensors data. Hopefully we will be pushing the code to Github soon! #XDK #IOTA
#IOTA is already top3 of the most important crypto projects on the planet.  prove me wrong.
@cz_binance @nallano We could do it tomorrow using #IOTA if you want
IOTA Hardware Wallet Support from Ledger! #IOTA  https://t.co/YENZMz6D6L

#IOTA Foundation will integrate IOTA tokens with Ledger’s hardware #crypto wallets. This will enable users to validate transactions on their wallet as part of the security protocol. IOTA is the most innovative project out there, and until now, there was no safe way to store it.

The #Accessec #IOTA Dev-Team is about to finalize a #carwallet based on the #Tangle and they will showcase that before #xmas - Secure payments for #echarging and #mobility made reality!  https://t.co/C9MtZVklFn

The #IOTA Foundation announced today a new collaboration with #Ledger, the #cryptocurrency and #blockchain security leader, to integrate IOTA tokens with Ledger’s secure hardware wallets for cryptocurrency. Get your limited hardwallet now! ➡➡  https://t.co/tcpjvKPh5J ⬅⬅  https://t.co/ruaWeWSx6g
#IOTA Foundation: We have also provided a guide for setting your Ledger up with Trinity. If you are unsure what certain things mean, they may well be answered here.  https://t.co/rjUG9opEI1 #miota
#ISOs close to becoming a reality: Enormous value to the #IOTA ecosystem  #blockchain #IoT #Cryptocurrency #crypto #ICO  Via:  https://t.co/9X4D2IWwCM
